rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Hyper Application (held down hyper+g to Fn)
Hyper Misc    (Check https://github.com/suliveevil/Capslock for all details)
While using Programmer Dvorak, holding command temporarily switches to the US qwerty layout.
Remap keys to use Programmer Dvorak-CmdQwerty keyboard layout
